word: “AFTER THIS HE WISHED TO SAY ESPECIALLY TO HIS YOUNG FRIENDS IN BATTLE CREEK: ‘DON'T TAKE MY LIFE FOR AN EXAMPLE; GIVE UP THE WORLD AND BE CHRISTIANS.’ IN THE EVENING, AS ONE OF HIS SINKING SPELLS WAS COMING ON, ALL THOUGHT THAT IN A FEW MINUTES HIS HEAVING BOSOM WOULD BE AT REST. HE BADE EACH ONE AN AFFECTIONATE FAREWELL, AS THEY LISTENED TO CATCH EACH WHISPER.
